org.nahid.domain

Class ShoppingCart

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nahid.domain.ShoppingCart

  • public class ShoppingCart
extends Object
    Represents a shopping cart to which you can add and remove books.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ShoppingCart()
      Creates a new ShoppingCart with no content.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addToCart(Book b)
      Adds a Book to this ShoppingCart.
      List<Book> asList()
      Returns a List representation of this ShoppingCart.
      void remove(Book b)
      Removes a Book from this ShoppingCart
      BigDecimal totalAmount()
      Returns the total amount for the Books in this ShoppingCart

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ShoppingCart

        public ShoppingCart()
        Creates a new ShoppingCart with no content.

    • Method Detail

      • addToCart

        public void addToCart(Book b)
        Adds a Book to this ShoppingCart.
        Parameters:
        b - The book to be added

      • remove

        public void remove(Book b)
        Removes a Book from this ShoppingCart
        Parameters:
        b - The book to be removed

      • asList

        public List<Book> asList()
        Returns a List representation of this ShoppingCart.
        Returns:
        A List<Book> with the contents of this ShoppingCart

      • totalAmount

        public BigDecimal totalAmount()
        Returns the total amount for the Books in this ShoppingCart
        Returns:
        The total amount, i.e. the sum of the prices for the Books in this ShoppingCart
